#summary macro on file iterators in a directory.

= Introduction =

js marco on directory (since rev.85)


= Details =

sometimes, you maybe need to do some macro on files in directory tree.
like rename them or copy.

this macro will make the task easier.

example: list all files and their size in a directory recursively.
you could change "dir" and "onFile()" to fit your needs.
{{{

var dir="d:/tmp";
function onFile(f){
  return f.getAbsolutePath()+'	'+f.length();
}

}}}
